---
title: "production.yaml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines configuration for feature flags in a production environment. It specifies two different types of feature flags: a variant flag and a boolean flag, each with its own set of properties.

## Code Structure
The YAML file is structured with top-level keys defining the version, namespace, and a list of flags. Each flag in the list has its own set of properties.

## Symbols

### version
#### Description
Specifies the version of the configuration format.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| version | string | The version number of the configuration format |

### namespace
#### Description
Defines the environment or context for these flags.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| namespace | string | The name of the environment or context |

### flags
#### Description
A list of feature flags, each with its own configuration.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| flags | list | A list of feature flag configurations |

### Flag Configuration
#### Description
Each flag in the list has the following properties:

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| key | string | A unique identifier for the flag |
| name | string | A human-readable name for the flag |
| type | string | The type of the flag (e.g., VARIANT_FLAG_TYPE, BOOLEAN_FLAG_TYPE) |
| description | string | A brief description of the flag's purpose |
| enabled | boolean | Whether the flag is currently enabled or not |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| version | string | "1.2" | The version of the configuration format |
| namespace | string | "production" | The environment or context for these flags |

## API/Interface Reference
While this is not an API definition, it does define an interface for feature flags:

| Flag Key | Type | Enabled | Description |
|:---------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| flag_variant | VARIANT_FLAG_TYPE | false | Variant Flag Description |
| flag_boolean | BOOLEAN_FLAG_TYPE | true | Boolean Flag Description |

This configuration can be used by a feature flag system to determine which flags are available and their current state in the production environment.
